c1.name: Spiraling Tempest
c1.descriptionRaw: Increases the pulling speed of <color=#FFD780FF>Gale Blade</color> after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.
c1.description: Increases the pulling speed of Gale Blade after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.

c2.name: People's Aegis
c2.descriptionRaw: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.
c2.description: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.

c3.name: When the West Wind Arises
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Dandelion Breeze</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Dandelion Breeze by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Lands of Dandelion
c4.descriptionRaw: Within the Field created by <color=#FFD780FF>Dandelion Breeze</color>, all opponents have their <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 40%.
c4.description: Within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze, all opponents have their Anemo RES decreased by 40%.

c5.name: Outbursting Gust
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Gale Blade</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Gale Blade by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt
c6.descriptionRaw: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by <color=#FFD780FF>Dandelion Breeze</color>. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.
c6.description: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.
